articles.title: UK to roll out Oxford COVID-19 vaccine from Jan. 4, Sunday Telegraph says - Reuters
articles.description: The United Kingdom will roll out Oxford University’s COVID-19 vaccine from Jan. 4, according to plans being drawn up by ministers, The Sunday Telegraph reported.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: Oxford coronavirus vaccine 'to be rolled out across country on January 4' - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Oxford vaccine is a lot easier to handle than the Pfizer alternative with the government setting a Covid vaccination target of 2m within a fortnight
articles.content:
Plans have been drawn up to roll out the Oxford coronavirus vaccine across the country on January 4, it has been reported.
